thread.title: Actress Ashley Benson apologizes for Cecil the Lion costume
thread.title_full: Actress Ashley Benson apologizes for Cecil the Lion costume

author: More Content Now staff
title: Actress Ashley Benson apologizes for Cecil the Lion costume
text: Comment By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 8, 2015 @ 11:57 am Actress Ashley Benson has apologized after sparking up Internet uproar on Tuesday this week when she posted a snap of herself wearing a "Cecil the Lion" costume on her Instagram account. The former "Pretty Little Liars" actress posted the photo along with a caption that read, " Help! Can't decide on my Halloween costume this year! What do you guys thing of this Cecil the Lion costume?" Comments on the photo showed people weren't digging the costume, and Benson quickly changed the caption to remove Cecil's name. (Cecil was the beloved South African lion illegally killed by an American dentist on a hunting trip earlier this year.) Yesterday, the actress took to Instagram again to issue an apology:
